explains: n. 私房屋主；自己拥有住房者

sentences.en: You are advised to read the small print of homeowner and car insurance policies.
sentences.cn: 建议你读一下房主保险单和汽车保险单上的小号印刷字。

sentences.en: Theses 18-hour cities are rapidly on the rise and offer great opportunities for homeowner investment.
sentences.cn: 这些18小时城市正在迅速崛起，为房主投资提供了巨大的机会。
